title: Just Like Yesterday
description: Hazel Brown lost six months of memory, which includes the summer that she conceived her son. She has no idea who his father could be. She only knows that her son looks like the Benedicts, the family that owns the orphanage where she grew up... Now that she has the means to fight to get her son from the Deckers, his adoptive family, she finds out that the handsome, single Curtis Decker is willing to share her son with her after all...
author: Brenda Barrett
